text1:
Called the “old flying brick” by its crew, the endeavour-class has a sleek profile with most of its firepower at the front. It renders dodging incoming torpedoes easier, even if the ship has a mediocre maneuverability.
The ship was mostly forgotten by time for better designs.

A refitted variant of the endeavour-class, it trades most of its weaponry for 2 hangar bays. Its large missile slot serves it well for short engagements.
The ship was mostly forgotten by time for better designs.
A Terran world devastated by human hands. Lifeless and forgotten.
